skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This one has adopted a warrior name to strike fear into enemy hearts, a moniker backed up by their deeds in battle.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Lord's own combat skills

skillTree.localised_description: This one's chosen name is muttered in hushed tones, reflecting as it does their vile proclivities.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Lord's army

skillTree.localised_description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Making use of meticulously kept nautical charts and land maps, the Navigator is an integral part of a Black Ark's operation.
Each Black Ark is a fortress-city without peer. Throwing oneself unto its Black-Stone defences is folly without equal.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 when defending 
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Black Ark provides near-limitless access to pristine arms and armour, each raiding party clad in the finest forgework.
The presence of a powerful Sorceress upon the Black Ark provides opportunities to weave the darkest magecraft.
Druchii do not know fear. It is you who ought to be afraid.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10%
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Kept in the innermost sections of the Black Ark, safe from the corrosive sea air.
Dragging the ocean waters produces all manner of interesting finds, some of them edible.
The war beasts of the Druchii can convalesce aboard nearby Black Arks.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -4% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether a function of superior Druchii seafaring or the towers of sorcery aboard the Black Arks, the Naggarothi always benefit from the winds.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Wyrm, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Wyrm, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +9% for Bloodwrack Medusae units

	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +12% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Wyrm, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Wyrm, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Wyrm, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
One would imagine being the size of a small island would hinder stealth. The sorcerers weaving spells of misdirection in the hold would beg to differ.

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Black Arks are helmed by Druchii as indomitable and unbreakable as their iron ramparts.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Black Arks are the largest vessels commanded by a Dark Elf Corsair, vast floating fortresses capable of carrying thousands of warriors and slaves.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(Lord's army)
